Welcome to Pups Parlour

Pups Parlour is a fully qualified and recognised professional dog grooming service that specialises in small dogs run by Samantha in the heart of Mountsorrel. Working one-to-one with your pup allows them to get all the care and attention that they deserve. The parlour promotes a calm and relaxing atmosphere for all dogs that visit, allowing them to be pampered to the highest standard by a skilled professional.

So get your dog booked in for a relaxing pamper today!
